nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine

Class XenonEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine.XenonEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Xenon

    public final class XenonEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements Xenon
    XenonEngine implements the Xenon Interface class by redirecting all calls to Adaptors.
    Since:
    1.0
